code: import React,{useState}from'react';import teethIcon from'../assets/teeth-icon.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HomePage=_ref=>{let{onStart}=_ref;const[age,setAge]=useState('');const handleStart=()=>{const ageNumber=parseInt(age);if(ageNumber>=0&&ageNumber<=120){onStart(ageNumber);}};const isValidAge=age!==''&&parseInt(age)>=0&&parseInt(age)<=120;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"speech-bubble-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"speech-bubble",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"speech-text",children:["\u30A2\u30D7\u30EA\u3067\u7C21\u5358\u30C1\u30A7\u30C3\u30AF\uFF01",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"\u3042\u306A\u305F\u306E\u304A\u53E3\u306E\u72B6\u614B\u306B\u5408\u3063\u305F\u30B1\u30A2\u3092\u3054\u6848\u5185\u3057\u307E\u3059"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"character-avatar",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(teethIcon,")")}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"age-input-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"age-label",children:"\u5E74\u9F62\u3092\u5165\u529B\u3057\u3066\u304F\u3060\u3055\u3044"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",className:"age-input",placeholder:"\u4F8B: 25",value:age,onChange:e=>setAge(e.target.value),min:"0",max:"120"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"start-button",onClick:handleStart,disabled:!isValidAge,children:"\u30B9\u30BF\u30FC\u30C8\uFF01"})]})]});};export default HomePage;
